name: Renz Marvin Eullo
text: You can get  http://gaming.logitech.com/en-us/product/f710-wireless-gamepad  for 1.7k at datablitz, or 1k for the wired version  http://gaming.logitech.com/en-us/product/f310-gamepad. Cheaper than the 360 controller for windows by a few hundred, and works beautifully.
